constituent: hegemony, old west, leather, flowers, car, mouth, ten, needle, moon, month, flesh, part of the body
koohiiStory1: In the old west, animal skins were made into leather and their flesh was eaten, thus using the whole animal, which viewed from the animal side could be taken as humans asserting complete hegemony over them. All your base are belong to us.
koohiiStory2: In the Old West, cowboys had hegemony OVER the Indians despite their leathercraft and ability to navigate by the moon.
